title: How to Activate Your SIM
content: Activating your SIM is the first step to using Hello Telecom services. Without activation, you cannot make calls, send SMS, or use data. Insert your SIM card, dial *123#, and wait for a confirmation SMS. If you do not receive the SMS, check that your phone is unlocked and supports Hello Telecomâ€™s network.

title: How to Top-Up
content: You can add credit to your Hello Telecom account using multiple methods: buy a voucher and dial *101*PIN#, use the Hello Telecom App and select Top-Up, or visit hello-telecom.com/topup. Credit is applied instantly. If delayed, check your SMS inbox for confirmation before retrying.

title: Check Your Balance
content: To check your balance, dial *101# for an instant USSD reply or use the Hello Telecom App dashboard. Postpaid users will see their remaining data, while prepaid users see both credit and data bundles.

title: Prepaid Plans Overview
content: Prepaid plans give you flexibility without contracts. Options include daily bundles starting at $2/day, weekly bundles with balanced calls and data, and monthly bundles for best value. Good for students, travelers, or cost-conscious users.

title: Postpaid Plans Overview
content: Postpaid plans are billed monthly and start at $20/month. They include unlimited local calls, flexible data add-ons, and a detailed monthly bill via email or app. Good for professionals and families who need consistent connectivity.

title: Data Packages
content: You can add extra data anytime: 1GB (1 day), 5GB (7 days), 10GB (30 days), or unlimited options. Activate via *123*data# or the app. Data usage alerts are sent via SMS.

title: No Signal
content: Signal issues may result from outages, SIM problems, or coverage gaps. Restart your phone, reinsert your SIM, or switch to 3G/4G manually. If the problem persists, call customer care at 111 or visit a service center.

title: Slow Internet
content: Slow connections can be caused by bundle limits or poor coverage. Check if your bundle is expired, confirm you are in a strong coverage area, or switch to 4G/5G if available. Tip: toggle airplane mode to refresh your connection.

title: Lost SIM
content: If you lose your SIM, call 111 immediately to block it, then visit the nearest Hello Telecom store with ID for a replacement. Replacement fees may apply.

title: Contact Customer Care
content: Our support team is available 24/7. Dial 111 from your Hello SIM or email support@hello-telecom.com.

title: Hello Telecom App Support
content: Use the Help section in the Hello Telecom App to chat with an agent or view guides. This is the fastest way to resolve account issues.

title: Website FAQ
content: Visit hello-telecom.com/faq for quick answers to common problems, including billing and roaming.
